text: "Pure Morning" is a 1998 song by British alternative rock band Placebo. It is the leading single from their second studio album Without You I'm Nothing. It went to the top 50 in the United Kingdom, Scotland, Ireland, Iceland, New Zealand, Canada and Australia. ==Track listings== UK CD1 # "Pure Morning" (radio edit) # "Mars Landing Party" # "Leeloo" UK CD2 # "Pure Morning" (album version) # "Needledick" # "The Innocence of Sleep" ==References== Category:1998 songs Category:Placebo (band) songs
title: Pure Morning
